subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sixth-seeded Juan Martín del Potro defeated Rafael Nadal, 6-2, 6-2, 6-2, to reach his first Grand Slam final. He will face Roger Federer, who beat Novak Djokovic, 7-6 (3), 7-5, 7-5. Kim Clijsters capped a stunning comeback by beating Caroline Wozniacki of Denmark, 7-5, 6-2.
